dimensions.notes: 18 = diameter in mm, 65 = height in mm, 0 = cylindrical

protection.unprotected: No built-in protection - requires external BMS

safety_notes: Use appropriate charger with CC/CV profile
Avoid physical damage - can cause thermal runaway
Store at 40-60% charge for long term
Unprotected cells require external battery management

chemistry_variants.lco: Lithium Cobalt Oxide - High energy density, lower thermal stability
chemistry_variants.lmo: Lithium Manganese Oxide - Excellent thermal stability and safety
chemistry_variants.nmc: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxide - Balanced energy, safety, power

capacity_vs_current_tradeoff: High capacity (>3000mAh) comes at cost of lower current rating. Optimal range 2600-3000mAh for balance of capacity and performance.
notes: Most popular lithium-ion format. Name comes from dimensions: 18mm diameter × 65mm height. Maximum commercial capacity as of 2024 is 3600mAh. Widely used in consumer electronics and electric vehicles.
